import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; class Home extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { firstValue:0, secondValue:0, count:0 } } one(){ this.setState((prevState) => ({count: prevState.count +1})) console.log(this.one) } increment(){ this.setState((prevState) => ({count: prevState.count + 1})) } decrement(){ this.setState((prevState) => { if(prevState.count > 0){ return{count: prevState.count - 1} } }) } zero(){ this.setState((prevValue) =>{ if(prevValue.firstValue !== -1){ return{firstValue: 0} } else{ return{secondValue: 0} } }) } render(){ return(

Calculatrice:

{this.state.count}
) } } export default Home; {/*
